UPDATE /**根据计费规则ID批量激活计价明细 2016-08-31 348757-陈程**/ PKP.T_SRV_EC_PRICING_CRI_DETAIL T SET T.ACTIVE = 'Y',T.VERSION_NO = #{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},T.MODIFY_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE T.PRICING_VALUATION_ID IN
#{valuationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
